ygData.subject: Re: So anyone wanna trade...
ygData.msgSnippet: Would a Robe of the Oracle be a decent trade for a pair of MM Battle drums? Also anyone on Bristlebane interested in a trade like this? =) Dank McGillicuty ...
ygData.messageBody:
Would a Robe of the Oracle be a decent trade for a pair of MM Battle drums?
Also anyone on Bristlebane interested in a trade like this? =)

Dank McGillicuty

----- Original Message -----
From: JasonF <JasonF@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, November 15, 1999 11:28 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] So anyone wanna trade...


> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
>
> Yeah, it's way old alright. I'm 32 now and have a set of drums. :)
>
> Crier
>
> > From: "Blitz Krieg" <blitz_krieg@...>
> >
> > I know this is way old (going thru old email) but 28 is not even close
to
> > strong enough to get your own drum, unless you're extremelly lucky.
> >
> > I ended up buying a chipped bone bracelet for 500 pp and trading that
for
> > the MM Drums.
> >
> > Darkfox Reven'tsol
> > Xegony
> >
> > > > well (and we bards are the brightest bunch). At 28th I think that
I'm
> > > > approaching the level that I would expect to be able to get a MM
> > > > Battle Drum
> > > > with my own group. Is this correct?
> > > >
> > > > Crier Sharpsong
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
